document.full_text: the u.s. government is allowed to bar non-native americans from using eagle feathers for religious purposes, even for rituals that imitate or borrow from indian culture, a federal appeals court ruled on tuesday.
document.title: court affirms exclusive native american use of eagle feathers
lines_and_colors: the u.s. government is allowed to bar non-native americans from using eagle feathers for religious purposes, even for rituals that imitate or borrow from indian culture, a federal appeals court ruled on tuesday.
